commit.message:
Adds support for storing and showing word count (#11)

* shows word count and estimated reading time when editing a post
* stores word count on the Document model in Gaia
* shows word count on post preview if available (must be saved/updated to Gaia first)
* refactors form submission method to have separate validator method
* adds an `estimateReadingTime` helper method

commit.message:
proof: add tracking for anchor status (#8)

* add tracking for anchor status

* adds better behavior around loading states

* set doc fetching load status in redux

* better handling of missing proof data

* fix hide sidebar bug on touch screens

* add proof details view to post edit page

* deal with irretrievable proofs when in non-logged in state

* add support for resubmitting expired anchors

* udpate deps
